name: Booty Tower
description:
Climb an endless tower filled with riches and loot! 

You're a pirate seeking fortune in the dangerous Booty Tower. The higher you climb, the more loot you collect! But be careful, falling too far or getting hit by traps will stop your run!

Features:
• Challenging, endless platformer with variety of platform types and obstacles.
• Easy controls: Press left half of screen to move left, and press right half to move right. Faster you move, higher the jump.
• Collect treasure to buy characters and upgrades.
• 20 unlockable characters.
• Upgradable power-ups.

Controls:

• Android: Press left half of screen to move left . Press right half to move right.
• PC/Mac: Press 'A' or Left Arrow to move left. Press 'D' or Right Arrow to move right.
